scripts.test:e2e:chrome: cypress run --config-file cypress-e2e.config.ts --browser chrome --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config-report-chrome.json --spec
scripts.test:e2e:firefox: cypress run --config-file cypress-e2e.config.ts --browser firefox --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config-report-firefox.json --spec
scripts.test:e2e:edge: cypress run --config-file cypress-e2e.config.ts --browser edge --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config-report-edge.json --spec
scripts.test:integer:chrome: cypress run --config-file cypress-api.config.ts --browser chrome --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config-report-chrome.json --spec
scripts.test:integer:firefox: cypress run --config-file cypress-api.config.ts --browser firefox --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config-report-firefox.json --spec
scripts.test:integer:edge: cypress run --config-file cypress-api.config.ts --browser edge --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config-report-edge.json --spec
scripts.clean:reports: npm run junit:rm:report && npm run mocha:rm:report
scripts.chrome:report: npm run merge:junit:c:report && npm run merge:json:c:report && npm run gen:mocha:c:report
scripts.firefox:report: npm run merge:junit:f:report && npm run merge:json:f:report && npm run gen:mocha:f:report
scripts.edge:report: npm run merge:junit:e:report && npm run merge:json:e:report && npm run gen:mocha:e:report
